      Commit to DB(conn) as user usr, with SQL:
      update m.tbl set field = v where whereqs[0] = whereqs[1] and whereqs[2] = whereqs[3] ...

        conn -
        m - the table must have a pk.
        valfield -
        kvs -
        Returns:
